content: Back in NYC, suitcase stuffed with sketches, head buzzing with ideas. Culture shock's real - from bowing to dodging subway pigeons. Sketching with a Japanese twist now. Thinking of a cultural exchange event. Who's up for it?
raw_content: "Back in NYC with a suitcase full of sketches and a head full of ideas. The culture shock is real - I've gone from bowing to people to dodging pigeons on the subway. 🚇 Sketching again, but now with a touch of Japanese flair. Next up: brainstorming a cultural exchange event. Who's in?"

content: Just turned 22 and now I'm coding an art recognition tool. My Tokyo sketches are the test subjects - let's see if the AI can handle my "cultural twist.
raw_content: Just turned 22 and already diving into AI & ML like it's my birthday cake 🍰📚. Got my hands on a coding project for an art recognition tool - turns out, my sketches from Tokyo are more than just souvenirs! The challenge? Making the code recognize my "cultural twist" in art. #TechMeetsArt #LearningCurve
